title: Bulls vs. Heat
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 1 at 6:00PM ET:
If the Bulls win, the market will resolve to "Bulls".
If the Heat win, the market will resolve to "Heat".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
The result will be determined based on the final score including any overtime periods.

markets.question: Spread: Heat (-5.5)
markets.description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 1 at 6:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Heat" if the Heat win the game by 6 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Bulls". If the game ends in a tie, this market will resolve to "Bulls".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Bulls vs. Heat: O/U 234.5
markets.description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 1 at 6:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Bulls and Heat combine to score 235 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 235, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
